entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
